channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (1 Apr 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Cathy Tibbles
item.dc:creator: Cathy Tibbles
item.description:
Ohmygod. You had me going for a few minutes. And then I thought, "No... wix must be the name of a new child theme.... I wonder if they know Wix is a website builder..." LOL
Great news still... aside from getting me!
Cathy
item.content:encoded:
Ohmygod. You had me going for a few minutes. And then I thought, “No… wix must be the name of a new child theme…. I wonder if they know Wix is a website builder…” LOL

Great news still… aside from getting me!

Cathy

item.title: By: Matt Ryan
item.dc:creator: Matt Ryan
item.description: Thank God I read through the whole post to see the comments. Duh! Brain fart lasted until today! And only then did it give me a good laugh.
item.content:encoded: Thank God I read through the whole post to see the comments. Duh! Brain fart lasted until today! And only then did it give me a good laugh.

item.title: By: Jamaluddin Rahmat
item.dc:creator: Jamaluddin Rahmat
item.description:
WIX??? April Fool day?
Hahaha...
But I think the missing information is recurring StudioPress Pro Plus pack. #CMIIW
item.content:encoded:
WIX??? April Fool day?

Hahaha…

But I think the missing information is recurring StudioPress Pro Plus pack. #CMIIW

item.title: By: Nicola Tweed
item.dc:creator: Nicola Tweed
item.description: Oh my gosh, you totally had me fooled! I was like no way am I missing something that Wix is the future?! Good one and thanks for the mention.
item.content:encoded: Oh my gosh, you totally had me fooled! I was like no way am I missing something that Wix is the future?! Good one and thanks for the mention.

item.title: By: Tony
item.dc:creator: Tony
item.description:
hehe good think I started learning Wix last night and became a certified Wix Master this morning! Most intense few hours of my life.
Just in time :)
Thanks for another week of great content!
item.content:encoded:
hehe good think I started learning Wix last night and became a certified Wix Master this morning! Most intense few hours of my life.

Just in time ðŸ™‚

Thanks for another week of great content!

item.title: By: Greg Maldewin
item.dc:creator: Greg Maldewin
item.description: Haha, good one. I was even prepared for some April fools stunts, but was still caught off gaurd for a few seconds.
item.content:encoded: Haha, good one. I was even prepared for some April fools stunts, but was still caught off gaurd for a few seconds.

item.title: By: Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description: Did you reject the offer from Squarespace?
item.content:encoded: Did you reject the offer from Squarespace?

item.title: By: Theresa Wagar
item.dc:creator: Theresa Wagar
item.description: Omg! Really Wix? In the old days you could have said Frontpage. Lol. Be still my heart and happy April Fool's Day!
item.content:encoded: Omg! Really Wix? In the old days you could have said Frontpage. Lol. Be still my heart and happy April Fool’s Day!

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description: Oh, how funny!! I was laying in bed reading this on my phone and busted out laughing! At first I saw Wix and went "WHAT!" Then it dawned on me what day it was. That's a good one Nick!
item.content:encoded: Oh, how funny!! I was laying in bed reading this on my phone and busted out laughing! At first I saw Wix and went “WHAT!” Then it dawned on me what day it was. That’s a good one Nick!
